title: The Bachelorette's Matt Whyatt is busted kissing MAFS' Jessika Power
text:
He may be a front-runner to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.

But it seems BMX pro Matt Whyatt doesn't win the show, as he was pictured last month on a romantic date with Married At First Sight 'villain' Jessika Power.

The pair were spotted passionately kissing while spending the day together on the Gold Coast on September 22, just weeks before The Bachelorette season premiere.

Look away now, Angie! It seems BMX pro Matt Whyatt doesn't win The Bachelorette, as he was pictured last month on a romantic date with Married At First Sight 'villain' Jessika Power

They looked very comfortable in each other's company, with Matt wrapping his arms around Jessika's waist and affectionately rubbing her shoulders.





Matt exuded bad boy charm in a striped T-shirt that showcased his sprawling arm tattoos, a pair of black shorts and a backwards facing baseball cap.

Meanwhile, Jessika flaunted her curvy figure in a tight white T-shirt dress.

Caught in the act! The pair were spotted passionately kissing while spending the day together on the Gold Coast on September 22, just weeks before The Bachelorette season premiere

She slung a black messenger bag over one shoulder and completed her casual look with a pair of tan leather sandals.

After saying goodbye to Matt, Jessika jumped into her car and drove away.

'It looked like she had stayed with him for a few days', an onlooker said.

Getting handsy! They looked very comfortable in each other's company, with Matt wrapping his arms around Jessika's waist and affectionately rubbing her shoulders

Earlier in the day, the pair were seen returning to Matt's apartment after visiting a local McDonald's restaurant.

They shared a lively conversation as they strolled down the street together.

Jessika clutched a take-away beverage as she showed off her flat stomach in a white crop top and mini skirt.

Shacking up? 'It looked like she had stayed with him for a few days', an onlooker said

It comes after Daily Mail Australia revealed that Matt and Jessika had 'spent the night together' after meeting at a Gold Coast nightclub in early September.

Multiple sources confirmed the pair flirted up a storm inside the YOT Club, before leaving together and going back to Matt's place.

'They were all over each other in their private booth, they didn't care who saw them,' said an insider.

Breezy outing: Earlier in the day, the pair were seen returning to Matt's apartment after visiting a local McDonald's restaurant

Once the pair were back at Matt's, they cheekily sent a 'disappearing photo' of themselves in bed together to some of the other Bachelor contestants on Instagram.

'Everybody in The Bachelor world was gossiping about Matt's hook-up with Jessika in the secret Bachelor group chats,' another source revealed.

'Some of the girls even seemed a bit jealous because they were hoping to have a shot with Matt on Bachelor in Paradise.'

Who needs The Bachelorette? They shared a lively conversation as they strolled down the street together

Before spending the night together, Jessika had shared a photo of herself cuddling up to Matt inside the nightclub on her public Instagram story.

The pair appeared quite close in the photo, with a scantily-clad Jessika leaning in close to the BMX daredevil, who smiled while pointing at her cleavage.

Matty's antics will leave Channel 10 publicists fuming, as contestants on The Bachelor and The Bachelorette are contractually required to keep a low profile on social media to avoid spoiling the show.

Looking good! Jessika clutched a take-away beverage as she showed off her flat stomach in a white crop top and mini skirt

Once the show is airing, all of their Instagram posts and captions must be approved by Channel 10's publicity department until their elimination has aired.

If Matt happens to be the 'winner' of Angie's season - which now seems highly unlikely - it will be interesting to see how she reacts to his night with Jessika.

Meanwhile, Angie has confirmed she is still dating the person who wins her heart, telling The Project on Wednesday she is 'very, very happy' with her new man.

Scandalous! It comes after Daily Mail Australia revealed that Matt and Jessika had 'spent the night together' after meeting at a Gold Coast nightclub in early September

Eyewitness account: 'They were all over each other in their private booth, they didn't care who saw them,' an insider said of their nightclub hook-up

How will Angie take the news? Viewers will see Matt's relationship with Angie Kent (pictured) unfold on The Bachelorette in the coming weeks
description: It seems BMX pro Matt Whyatt doesn't win The Bachelorette, as he was pictured last month on a romantic date with Married At First Sight 'villain' Jessika Power
authors: Jacques Peterson For Daily Mail Australia
